verses.name: Psalms 139:2
verses.text: Eripe me, Domine, ab homine malo ;  a viro iniquo eripe me.

verses.name: Psalms 139:3
verses.text: Qui cogitaverunt iniquitates in corde,  tota die constituebant prælia.

verses.name: Psalms 139:4
verses.text: Acuerunt linguas suas sicut serpentis ;  venenum aspidum sub labiis eorum.

verses.name: Psalms 139:5
verses.text: Custodi me, Domine, de manu peccatoris,  et ab hominibus iniquis eripe me.  Qui cogitaverunt supplantare gressus meos :

verses.name: Psalms 139:6
verses.text: absconderunt superbi laqueum mihi.  Et funes extenderunt in laqueum ;  juxta iter, scandalum posuerunt mihi.

verses.name: Psalms 139:7
verses.text: Dixi Domino : Deus meus es tu ;  exaudi, Domine, vocem deprecationis meæ.

verses.name: Psalms 139:8
verses.text: Domine, Domine, virtus salutis meæ,  obumbrasti super caput meum in die belli.

verses.name: Psalms 139:9
verses.text: Ne tradas me, Domine, a desiderio meo peccatori :  cogitaverunt contra me ;  ne derelinquas me, ne forte exaltentur.

verses.name: Psalms 139:10
verses.text: Caput circuitus eorum :  labor labiorum ipsorum operiet eos.

verses.name: Psalms 139:11
verses.text: Cadent super eos carbones ;  in ignem dejicies eos :  in miseriis non subsistent.

verses.name: Psalms 139:12
verses.text: Vir linguosus non dirigetur in terra ;  virum injustum mala capient in interitu.

verses.name: Psalms 139:13
verses.text: Cognovi quia faciet Dominus judicium inopis,  et vindictam pauperum.

verses.name: Psalms 139:14
verses.text: Verumtamen justi confitebuntur nomini tuo,  et habitabunt recti cum vultu tuo.
